November 29, 1957
Mr. Carl B. Snow, Director
Audio-Visual Center
Western Michigan College
Kalamazoo, Michigan
Dear Mr. Snow:
Enclosed is a sample of our NAEB TV Research Fact Sheets
and an Index. Fact Sheets are priced at lfljpeach or $2.50 for all
those issued during the year. We can supply you with back issues
for the years 1955, 1956 and, of course, 1957. As of January, 1958
the Fact Sheets will be incorporated into the NAEB Journal, and will
no longer be mimeographer • The subscription price at that time wil
be $4.00 per year.
Ihe Fact Sheets are an effort to digest and centralize avail¬
able research principally on the effectiveness of radio and television
as instruct%ial tools. The Sheets are issued as a continuing series
at irregular intervals.
If you desire more information, please let us know.
Sincerely,
Enclosures
(Mrs JJudith B. Gans
Secretary
